scenes.npc_name: Middle Eastern and North African Society Rep
scenes.text:
Welcome to Cardiff University’s first ever Middle Eastern and North African Society, better known as MENA Soc!

We plan on dedicating this society on celebrating all MENA cultures spanning across the Middle East and North Africa. We hope to teach but also captivate the blend of ancient history and modern dynamism.

We’re all looking forward to enjoying the year with you all!

scenes.npc_name: Middle Eastern and North African Society Rep
scenes.text: We don't have a specific day, but specific date and times for socials we run can be found on our SU page and our social media.

scenes.npc_name: Middle Eastern and North African Society Rep
scenes.text: Our membership is £3.00 for the year!
